name: Desktop Snail
description:
Always wanted a desktop snail?  No? Ok... But here it is! Meet the Jiji! Download now and watch your snails degrade and degrade with them! Special thanks to: maxpopa17 - some ideas buho - no actual reason •ᛕ𝓊borg°, KontrollFreek, Bertoxy(bloodeleuste 83o/O) - testing and feedback kong - some help with code

the cool part is that it is configurable in almost any way!



and maybe join my discord server?
